item.title: We help organizations in transforming their strategic objectives into actions by apply project management and PMO practices to improve business performance.
Time to Make Pricing, Not Just Costing, a Core Competency of the Agency
item.description:
Time to Make Pricing, Not Just Costing, a Core Competency of the Agency

Tim Williams urges the advertising industry to catch up to the modern pricing practices of the 21st century. Client organisations have long had pricing -- not just accounting -- as a core function of their organisations.

item.title: Kickstarter-Funded Project Will Build Mars Dwelling Prototypes | Inc. Arabia
item.description:
Kickstarter-Funded Project Will Build Mars Dwelling Prototypes | Inc. Arabia

Possible designs include closed rivers, vertical farms, and turning Martian soil into water, air, and food. It sounds like a scene from a Matt Damon movie, but it isn't. Mars City Design, a startup headed by "Marschitect" Vera Mulyani, met its $30,000 goal on Kickstarter.

item.title: 3 Tips for Accurately Estimating Project Duration
item.description:
3 Tips for Accurately Estimating Project Duration

To the untrained eye, it may seem that when you're planning a project all you need to do is pull a start date out of the air and that's when everyone needs to hit the ground running. You only need to go down that path as a project manager once to realize that doesn't work.

item.title: The future of AI apps will be delivery as a service
item.description:
The future of AI apps will be delivery as a service

Artificial intelligence has turned into one of this year's hottest trends in advanced analytics, but the technology being rolled out today may not be what many people imagine it to be. Speakers at Dataversity's Smart Data Online said the future of AI apps is going to be intelligent applications delivered as a service.

item.title: The Project Management Estimation Key: Assure Stakeholders Buy In
item.description:
The Project Management Estimation Key: Assure Stakeholders Buy In

The Project Management Estimation Key: Assure Stakeholders Buy In Project management estimation is a key element of the Project Management. Starting the project execution with a baseline made based not on accurate estimations, is not the starting point we like to have as project managers!

item.title: How to Enable Your Team to Help You - ProjectManager.com
item.description:
How to Enable Your Team to Help You - ProjectManager.com

Leading a project can be overwhelming, but your team can be an asset to help you. If you let them! Leadership coach Susanne Madsen shows you how to engage your team in sharing project management responsibilities. Here's a shot of the whiteboard for your reference!

item.title: Deltek Cobra 8 New Project View
item.description:
Deltek Cobra 8 New Project View

This release of Deltek Cobra takes a huge step forward towards ease of use with the new project view. The two biggest take-aways from the new project view are: You can see multiple resource assignments at one time on the screen (you use to have to run a report).

item.title: How to create a project management Office
item.description:
How to create a project management Office

If we are performing work - internally or externally - that is helping to grow the company and yet we are struggling to accomplish this work because of poor communication, lack of detailed requirements or weak resource management and financial management of these efforts then it is likely that the organization could benefit greatly from the creation of a formal project management infrastructure.
